overview: Cleo's stepdad walks in on her shaving her private area and offers to help get some of those more hard to reach spots. Kayla notices her stepdad checking her out and realizes it turns her on. Vanna knows that a skinny outfit and pouty face will get some cash from her stepdad, but she also knows that giving him a reason to smile will keep him feeling generous. Jezebeth feels bad that her stepdad has to work so she decides to help him release some tension,
title: Dad Crush 13
